pr_title: [RW-5700][risk=no] Puppeteer Take screenshot and save page content

timeline.message: remove try catch in isLoaded function

timeline.bodyText: This is a bug. workspace-base page does not have isLoaded function which is called in waitForLoad function.
timeline.author: aweng98
aweng98
aweng98

timeline.bodyText: wait-utils. file changes is not related to the bug. I can undo this file if you would like.
timeline.author: aweng98

timeline.bodyText: why was try and catch remove?
timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Error caught in catch block is not handled and not passed on. Test continued and it made troubleshooting much harder to find what happened. So I want the test to stop when error happens and let handleTestEvent capture screenshot and save page content in a file.
replies.author: aweng98
